```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(readxl)
```

```{r}
 datae <- read_excel("My data.xlsm",range = "B12:C212")
 data2 <- read_excel("My data.xlsm",range = "XFA12:XFB212")
```

```{r}
df <- cbind(datae,data2)
```

```{r}
summary(df)
```

```{r}
df %>%
group_by(`situation‏`) %>%
summarise(countAF = n()) %>%
                
ggplot(aes(x = `situation‏`, y = countAF)) +
geom_bar(stat = "identity")
```

```{r}
df$`type of process`
```
